snippet: Dominic Thiem defeated Nicolas Almagro of Spain 7-6 (2), 3-6, 7-6 (4) to win the Argentina Open on Sunday and claim his fourth ATP singles title....
lead_paragraph: Dominic Thiem defeated Nicolas Almagro of Spain 7-6 (2), 3-6, 7-6 (4) to win the Argentina Open on Sunday and claim his fourth ATP singles title.

headline.print_headline: Thiem Wins Argentina Open to Take 4th Career Singles Title
headline.main: Thiem Wins Argentina Open to Take 4th Career Singles Title
